@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00168 for Sampling Event EMOBON_AAOT_Wa_66
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: National Research Council Institute of Marine Science (CNR-ISMAR)
Sampling country: Italy
Sampling station lat/long: 45.314167:12.508333
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Mauro Bastianini
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0001-6758-4192
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB50566

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00168
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_AAOT_Wa_66

MetaGOflow run id: HVWGWDSX5.UDI100
